name: CLBeaconIdentityConstraint
desc: Identity characteristics that can match one or more beacons.

items.name: init(uuid: UUID)
items.desc: Create a beacon identity constraint containing the UUID characteristic only, with wildcard values for the major and minor characteristics.

items.name: init(uuid: UUID, major: CLBeaconMajorValue)
items.desc: Create a beacon identity constraint containing the UUID and major characteristics, with a wildcard for the minor characteristic.

items.name: init(uuid: UUID, major: CLBeaconMajorValue, minor: CLBeaconMinorValue)
items.desc: Create a beacon identity constraint containing the UUID, major, and minor characteristics.

items.name: var uuid: UUID
items.desc: The UUID necessary to satisfy the constraint.

items.name: var major: UInt16?
items.desc: The constraint’s value for the major identity characteristic.

items.name: var minor: UInt16?
items.desc: The constraint’s value for the minor identity characteristic.
